metadata.title: CVE-2024-9397 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A missing delay in directory upload UI could have made it possible for anattacker to trick a user into granting permission via clickjacking. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox < 131, Firefox ESR < 128.3, Thunderbird <128.3, and Thunderbird < 131.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
